name: Blink (itch) (Murray Somerville)
description:
Blink is an experimental interactive narrative game.

Blink was made during Nordic Game Jam 2018. 

Credits are: 

Jakob Bang - Narrative Design

Murray Somerville -  Art

Jan Kanty Janiszewski - Game Design, Programming

Marcus Teller - Programming

Jakob Holm - Programming

Mathies Wiencke - Programming & Sound
